subjectalternativenames.attr_value AS subjectalternativenames, domainvalidationoptions.attr_value AS domainvalidationoptions, (serial.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS serial, (subject.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS subject, (issuer.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS issuer, timezone('00:00'::text, (to_timestamp((createdat.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'::text))::timestamp without time zone) AS createdat, timezone('00:00'::text, (to_timestamp((issuedat.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'::text))::timestamp without time zone) AS issuedat, timezone('00:00'::text, (to_timestamp((importedat.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'::text))::timestamp without time zone) AS importedat, (status.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS status, timezone('00:00'::text, (to_timestamp((revokedat.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'::text))::timestamp without time zone) AS revokedat, (revocationreason.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS revocationreason, timezone('00:00'::text, (to_timestamp((notbefore.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'::text))::timestamp without time zone) AS notbefore, timezone('00:00'::text, (to_timestamp((notafter.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]), 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS'::text))::timestamp without time zone) AS notafter, (keyalgorithm.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS keyalgorithm, (signaturealgorithm.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS signaturealgorithm, inuseby.attr_value AS inuseby, (failurereason.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS failurereason, (type.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS type, renewalsummary.attr_value AS renewalsummary, keyusages.attr_value AS keyusages, extendedkeyusages.attr_value AS extendedkeyusages, (certificateauthorityarn.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS certificateauthorityarn, (renewaleligibility.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS renewaleligibility, (certificatetransparencyloggingpreference.attr_value #>> '{}'::text[]) AS certificatetransparencyloggingpreference, tags.attr_value AS tags, _account_id.target_id AS _account_id FROM (((((((((((((((((((((((((((((resource r JOIN provider_account pa ON ((pa.id = r.provider_account_id))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute certificatearn ON (((certificatearn.resource_id = r.id) AND ((certificatearn.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((certificatearn.attr_name)::text) = 'certificatearn'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute domainname ON (((domainname.resource_id = r.id) AND ((domainname.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((domainname.attr_name)::text) = 'domainname'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute subjectalternativenames ON (((subjectalternativenames.resource_id = r.id) AND ((subjectalternativenames.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((subjectalternativenames.attr_name)::text) = 'subjectalternativenames'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute domainvalidationoptions ON (((domainvalidationoptions.resource_id = r.id) AND ((domainvalidationoptions.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((domainvalidationoptions.attr_name)::text) = 'domainvalidationoptions'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute serial ON (((serial.resource_id = r.id) AND ((serial.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((serial.attr_name)::text) = 'serial'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute subject ON (((subject.resource_id = r.id) AND ((subject.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((subject.attr_name)::text) = 'subject'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute issuer ON (((issuer.resource_id = r.id) AND ((issuer.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((issuer.attr_name)::text) = 'issuer'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute createdat ON (((createdat.resource_id = r.id) AND ((createdat.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((createdat.attr_name)::text) = 'createdat'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute issuedat ON (((issuedat.resource_id = r.id) AND ((issuedat.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((issuedat.attr_name)::text) = 'issuedat'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute importedat ON (((importedat.resource_id = r.id) AND ((importedat.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((importedat.attr_name)::text) = 'importedat'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute status ON (((status.resource_id = r.id) AND ((status.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((status.attr_name)::text) = 'status'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute revokedat ON (((revokedat.resource_id = r.id) AND ((revokedat.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((revokedat.attr_name)::text) = 'revokedat'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute revocationreason ON (((revocationreason.resource_id = r.id) AND ((revocationreason.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((revocationreason.attr_name)::text) = 'revocationreason'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute notbefore ON (((notbefore.resource_id = r.id) AND ((notbefore.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((notbefore.attr_name)::text) = 'notbefore'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute notafter ON (((notafter.resource_id = r.id) AND ((notafter.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((notafter.attr_name)::text) = 'notafter'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute keyalgorithm ON (((keyalgorithm.resource_id = r.id) AND ((keyalgorithm.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((keyalgorithm.attr_name)::text) = 'keyalgorithm'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute signaturealgorithm ON (((signaturealgorithm.resource_id = r.id) AND ((signaturealgorithm.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((signaturealgorithm.attr_name)::text) = 'signaturealgorithm'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute inuseby ON (((inuseby.resource_id = r.id) AND ((inuseby.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((inuseby.attr_name)::text) = 'inuseby'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute failurereason ON (((failurereason.resource_id = r.id) AND ((failurereason.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((failurereason.attr_name)::text) = 'failurereason'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute type ON (((type.resource_id = r.id) AND ((type.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((type.attr_name)::text) = 'type'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute renewalsummary ON (((renewalsummary.resource_id = r.id) AND ((renewalsummary.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((renewalsummary.attr_name)::text) = 'renewalsummary'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute keyusages ON (((keyusages.resource_id = r.id) AND ((keyusages.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((keyusages.attr_name)::text) = 'keyusages'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute extendedkeyusages ON (((extendedkeyusages.resource_id = r.id) AND ((extendedkeyusages.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((extendedkeyusages.attr_name)::text) = 'extendedkeyusages'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute certificateauthorityarn ON (((certificateauthorityarn.resource_id = r.id) AND ((certificateauthorityarn.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((certificateauthorityarn.attr_name)::text) = 'certificateauthorityarn'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute renewaleligibility ON (((renewaleligibility.resource_id = r.id) AND ((renewaleligibility.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((renewaleligibility.attr_name)::text) = 'renewaleligibility'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute certificatetransparencyloggingpreference ON (((certificatetransparencyloggingpreference.resource_id = r.id) AND ((certificatetransparencyloggingpreference.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((certificatetransparencyloggingpreference.attr_name)::text) = 'certificatetransparencyloggingpreference'::text)))) LEFT JOIN resource_attribute tags ON (((tags.resource_id = r.id) AND ((tags.type)::text = 'provider'::text) AND (lower((tags.attr_name)::text) = 'tags'::text)))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT _aws_organizations_account_relation.resource_id, _aws_organizations_account.id AS target_id FROM (resource_relation _aws_organizations_account_relation JOIN resource _aws_organizations_account ON (((_aws_organizations_account_relation.target_id = _aws_organizations_account.id) AND ((_aws_organizations_account.provider_type)::text = 'Account'::text) AND ((_aws_organizations_account.service)::text = 'organizations'::text)))) WHERE ((_aws_organizations_account_relation.relation)::text = 'in'::text)) _account_id ON ((_account_id.resource_id = r.id))) WHERE ((pa.provider = 'aws'::provider) AND (lower((r.provider_type)::text) = 'certificate'::text) AND ((r.service)::text = 'acm'::text));

table.name: aws_rds_dbcluster_ec2_securitygroup
table.viewSql: SELECT aws_rds_dbcluster.id AS dbcluster_id, aws_ec2_securitygroup.id AS securitygroup_id FROM ((resource aws_rds_dbcluster JOIN resource_relation rr ON (((rr.resource_id = aws_rds_dbcluster.id) AND ((rr.relation)::text = 'in'::text)))) JOIN resource aws_ec2_securitygroup ON (((aws_ec2_securitygroup.id = rr.target_id) AND ((aws_ec2_securitygroup.provider_type)::text = 'SecurityGroup'::text))));

table.name: aws_rds_dbinstance_ec2_securitygroup
table.viewSql: SELECT aws_rds_dbinstance.id AS dbinstance_id, aws_ec2_securitygroup.id AS securitygroup_id FROM ((resource aws_rds_dbinstance JOIN resource_relation rr ON (((rr.resource_id = aws_rds_dbinstance.id) AND ((rr.relation)::text = 'in'::text)))) JOIN resource aws_ec2_securitygroup ON (((aws_ec2_securitygroup.id = rr.target_id) AND ((aws_ec2_securitygroup.provider_type)::text = 'SecurityGroup'::text))));

table.name: import_job
table.remarks: (Internal) Keeps track of pending import jobs and associated metadata.

column.name: configuration
column.remarks: Import configuration for which provider and account id.

table.name: mapped_uri
table.remarks: (Internal) Mapped URIs.

table.name: provider_account
table.remarks: (Internal) Provider account.

table.name: provider_credential
table.remarks: (Internal) Provider account credentials.

table.name: raw_import
table.remarks: (Internal) Raw import.

column.name: source
column.remarks: Source of the data that produced this payload

column.name: context
column.remarks: JSON dictionary of values relevant to the call(s) that produced this response

column.name: mapped
column.remarks: Has this import job been mapped?

table.name: resource
table.remarks: Table of all imported resources across every provider.

table.name: resource_attribute
table.remarks: Attributes of resources.

table.name: resource_attribute_delta
table.remarks: Deltas on attributes of resources

table.name: resource_delta
table.remarks: Resource deltas between subseqnet import jobs.

table.name: resource_raw
table.remarks: Holds the JSON representation of a resource from a particular source

table.name: resource_relation
table.remarks: Relationships between resources.

table.name: resource_relation_attribute
table.remarks: Attributes on relationships between resources.

table.name: resource_relation_attribute_delta
table.remarks: Delta on attributes on relationships of resources.

table.name: resource_relation_delta
table.remarks: Deltas on relationships of resources.

table.name: schema_version
table.remarks: (Internal) Holds a single row with the current version of the goldfig schema

column.name: version
column.remarks: The current version of the goldfig schema
